resources.string: People may be sick with the virus for 1 to 14 days before developing symptoms. The most common symptoms of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) are fever, tiredness, and dry cough. Most people (about 80%) recover from the disease without needing special treatment. More rarely, the disease can be serious and even fatal. \n\nOlder people, and people with other medical conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, or heart disease), maybe more vulnerable to becoming severely Ill."

• Wash your hand regularly for 20 seconds, with soap and water.

 • Cover your nose and mouth with a disposable tissue or fixed elbow when you cough or sneeze.

 • Avoid close contact (1 meter or 3 feet) with people who are unwell.

 • Self isolate from others in the household if you feel unwell.

• Kotlin - Official programming language for Android application development by Google.

 • Volley - A type-safe HTTP client for java and kotlin by Google.

 • Picasso - A powerful image downloading and caching library for Android.

 • Architecture Components - A set of Jetpack components which help you to design robust, testable and maintainable apps.

 • Material Components - The material UI components for Android, designed and developed by Google.

 • Firebase - For crash reporting, analytics, and cloud messaging.

~ JHU CSSE - Johns Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering.

 ~ COVID19India.org - Official managed by indian govt.
